page.title: 08Employment Survey cont.
page.content: 3) 91.8% were in{Tertiary Industry, which is providing a service. We divided this into 2 categories: a) Service to a factory or commercial organisation e.g. secretary, warehouse foreman (30.9%) b) Service to the general public e.g. hairdresser, civil servant (60.9%). 57% of parents have daily journeys of 0 - 3 miles, 19% between 3 - 10 miles and 24% more then 10 miles. Many parents in the 1st group work in {Slough,}the 2nd group includes parents working at{Heathrow Airport}and the 3rd group includes{London}commuters. We checked the replies to the survey and found that in 17% of the homes both parents had full-time jobs and in 64% one parent had a full-time job and one a part-time job. We realise that we are very lucky in this area to avoid unemployment.
